scripts.test: npm run build && npm run buildtest && ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover nodeunit test/*.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run buildtest && ./node_modules/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit test/*.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/typings && ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc && NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js && cp -r .build/*.d.ts dist/typings
